items.title: Graphic Design Theory for Beginners 101 (Essentials)
items.headline: Learn Color Theory, Typography, Layout, Grids & Design Principles in an Easy Way
objectives_summary: After completing this course, you will have intermediate to expert knowledge of graphic design theory that you can immediately apply to your career or hobbies.
This course provides an overview of some of the most common graphic design principles and the thinking behind them.
The fundamentals of graphic design will be applied in your everyday life with the experience you gain.
